'''Horse saddles''' were [[item]]s which allowed the player to ride [[horse]]s.

== Obtaining ==
=== Crafting ===

 |ignoreusage=1
 |A1=Leather

== Usage ==
Horse saddles worked similarly to [[Saddle|regular saddles]] but were specifically used for [[horse]]s instead of [[pig]]s. A horse needed to be [[tamed]] before a horse saddle could be equipped. Unlike most items, horse saddles could be [[stack]]ed in groups of up to 32.

*The horse saddle shares the same texture of the "crafted saddle" from the [[ftb:Mo' Creatures|Mo' Creatures]] mod by DrZhark, who provided assistance in the horse's initial development.<ref>{{tweet|Jeb|319938276003827712|Also big thanks to @DrZhark, the creator of Mo' Creatures, that have assisted us to make it happen!|April 4, 2013}}</ref> This item also had the same crafting recipe and translation key.
